scripts.build-client: cd client && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://fixloapp.onrender.com REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.build-client-dev: cd client && REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true npm run build
scripts.deploy-build: rm -rf static/js/* static/css/* && cp -r client/build/* . && node scripts/clean-old-builds.js && echo 'Build deployed to root directory'
scripts.clean-old-builds:
find static/js -name 'main.*.js' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -printf '%T@ %p
' | sort -n | head -n -1 | cut -d' ' -f2- | xargs rm -f; find static/js -name 'main.*.js.map' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -printf '%T@ %p
' | sort -n | head -n -1 | cut -d' ' -f2- | xargs rm -f; find static/js -name 'main.*.js.LICENSE.txt' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -printf '%T@ %p
' | sort -n | head -n -1 | cut -d' ' -f2- | xargs rm -f
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client && npm run deploy-build && npm run generate-sitemap && npm run validate-deployment
scripts.build-dev: npm run install-client && npm run build-client-dev && npm run deploy-build && npm run generate-sitemap && npm run validate-deployment
